website_summaries.verdict: A top-class sander that excels by solving a lot of problems inherent in other models.
pros: Easy to assemble and get up and running
Noted for its quietness compared to other models
Cast iron work bed is solid and stable
cons: Some customers report issues with this option arriving damaged or missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 30 minutes, performing finish sanding with 400 grit on a guitar body when spindle suddenly started vibrating creating a wash board effect on mahogany body. This same unit is available through grizzly that has been delayed in production for 6 months. I know because I was on the back order list since Dec 23 and got frustrated and ordered this one, mistake. Now I know exactly why grizzly won’t accept these due to QC issues. Bottom line DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Scroggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Sanding Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is great sander! I had a smaller one before that was well rated but this one blows that out of the water. I like the larger suction swirl pattern in the disks that fit around the sanding sleeve. The smaller one just had holes. I also like the tightening nut on top. No wrench to get lost. Just remember that it tightens the opposite way. Lefty tighty, Righty Lucy! I don't use this a lot so will see about the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: SaltCitySteve

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the size of the unit; larger than I expected. Have used this unit for several months to contour sand the inside edges of oval frames I build as well as other pieces. It doesn't bog down, sands smooth and with an attached dust collector or vac. there is NO saw dust anywhere except in the collector. Very impressive. Changing spindles is quick and easy and replacement sanding sleeves are both reasonably priced and readily available. I would recommend this unit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Digiovanni

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for a couple projects now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a couple projects now and it seems to do very well. I have not bogged it down at all and it runs very smoothly and very quietly. Of course you can't hog a lot of material all at once as with the more industrial models but with a little patients it can be very effective. It has plenty of spindle sizes to match any curve you would want to sand/shape.
customer_reviews.author: mike everhart

customer_reviews.title: No excuse for crap like this to be marketed by anyone
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. The first one, ordered by me for my sister, came damaged and needed to be sent back. The second one (ordered by my sister in Michigan) runs glacially slow and stops when a piece of wood is applied to the spindle. No excuse for crap like this to be marketed by anyone, much less Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: F A.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Actually product is more than I bargained for! Runs quiet, spindle prefect 90 degrees to cast iron work bed. Packaging ok with all parts loose in bottom of box when arrived via UPS. No damage, packaging can improve. I'm sure company has had numerous claims on damage and broken parts.
customer_reviews.author: mogeebee

customer_reviews.title: Powertec spindle sander.
customer_reviews.text: Did some research and happy with our decision to choose this. This has so many uses in our workshop and has been a timesaver and made so many projects so much easier to accomplish. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J K P

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty shop tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty substantial shop tool. Heavy, big table, full 1" oscillation spindle, good dust collection. It needs its own stand or table space, because of its size and weight. You won't want to move this around much.
customer_reviews.author: JWinCinci

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works great and feels like a quality tool, fairly quiet, minimal vibration and the dust removal works fairly well, although I had to jury rig the connection to my shop vac. All in all I am very satisfied with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: konaram

customer_reviews.title: quality controll
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok, even though it was double boxed it arrived with one missing rubber foot......must have happened before it was boxed. I haven't investigated the problem with the spindle at the bottom of it's travel......it sounds like a conflict with the plastic fan disc. A 30 second test run prior to shipment and better packing and quality control could have fixed these aggravating shortfalls.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Corda

customer_reviews.title: Nice sander
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 6 months and if you took it away from me I would be lost. WOW, Quiet, excellent accuracy and dust collection. best spindle sander for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Powertec Spindle Sander
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the various reviews for oscillating spindle sanders,I chose the Powertec. Good value at a good price and so far has performed, I think, as good as or better than advertised. A great addition to my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sanding sleeves slip on drums and why red paint for top washers? Red paint rubs onto project and is hard to remove..overall not happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pam Blass

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sander!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the workhorse that was delivered to me. It's a very sturdy piece of machinery. It is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good sander at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I use my Powertec on almost a daily basis in furniture construction and it has performed well. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Plastic housing, quality cast iron top
customer_reviews.text: The machine works well for a small shop, mostly plastic housing, but the mechanism seems solid. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Easterday

customer_reviews.title: oscillating sander
customer_reviews.text: I researched every oscillating sander on the market and this is a great deal for the money. I highly recommend this model . Well made lots of power lots of great sanding attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: A Welcome Addition to my Shop
customer_reviews.text: A welcome addition to my shop. I use this POWERTEC oscillating spindle sander often, with a wide variety of hardwoods. It does a great job. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hagen LeBray

customer_reviews.title: For the money AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I have been checking spindle sanders out for about 6 months now. Don't know what took me so long. Guess I really didn't think I needed one. Just got it today and it has already made my life easier. Love it and like others said it is very quiet and looks well built for the money. Cannot beat the price with free shipping and no taxes! (thanks AMAZON) Nice machine. Now if it will last we will be doing good. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating sander
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to work on my scrollsaw projects, it really shortens the sanding time and I can see what I'm sanding better.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Law

customer_reviews.title: great sander
customer_reviews.text: I,m happy with this sander. It is nice to find a great tool on the internet. I think all people looking for this sander will be happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Heitkotter

customer_reviews.title: nice tool at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: all the sanding spindles fit and inserts fit in the housing. Operation is quiet and smooth. Power is adequate as long as you don't apply too much pressure.
customer_reviews.author: MMH

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my shop a lot to shape guitar bridges and braces. It is quiet and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Don Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice home spindle sander.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only one part missing.. Will call and get it sent. 1 inch travel and a 0.4 hp motor - great price for those specs.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Why have I waited so long to get one of these?
customer_reviews.text: First to keep this short and sweet, I agree with Chip's review 100%. This sander is much higher in quality than I expected. The only thing giving me fits is the dust port that *almost* fits my shop vacuum hose. It's just slightly too large on the OD, but I'll drop into Lowe's and get an adapter that I can modify and get this right. I'm looking forward to improving the looks of all my furniture projects with this unit. It can be set on a bench, but I've mounted it to its own stand (lowered the work surface to make it easier to see the pencil line...)
customer_reviews.author: John Treble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sander is quiet, the spindle is perpendicular to the table, and it seems to have plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected for the price. It's solidly built and extremely quiet in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Shutts

customer_reviews.title: Everything came in fine. Has saved so much time ---- wished I ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in fine. Has saved so much time ---- wished I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine for the home workshop
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected. This was a "used" purchase and it was in very good condition. The packaging could have been a lot better (some of the parts were loose inside the box) but everything was there and in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bolden

customer_reviews.title: LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED IT THE FIRST DAY I GOT IT. WORKS TO EXPECTATIONS. WISH IT HAD A STRONGER MOTOR. TABLE SURFACE IS PLENTY BIG. DELIVERY WAS THREE DAYS AHEAD OF SCHEDULE.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY CARNEY

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately, or fortunately mine came with a bent spindle and a large crack in the base. So I returned it. The seller was responsive but I didn't want another. Found the last Rigid duel sander in LA and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Powertec
customer_reviews.text: When I took the sander out of the box, with the help of my grandson, set it on the work bench and checked out the spindel and it was perfect alignment with the top, Am building a arts and craft rocker and this has made it so much easier. I checked out several sanders and am so glad I got this one. Worth every dime I paid for it. Heavy duty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This spindle sander is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The item was bigger than I thought. The spindle sander is very stable with a nice working table. The spindle was square to the table and the spindle inserts fit perfectly with no slop. I wished I would of purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Jadin

customer_reviews.title: woodworker
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best made O.S.S.'s I have seen for the price. It just needs to come with more grades of sanding tubes. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: bell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and efficiently. I would recommend buying several sets of sanding spindles in different grades. I would consider this a hobby tool. I doubt it would stand up to the rigors of life in a commercial wood shop, but for the hobbyist who will not be using it on huge pieces of lumber every day of the year it should be more than adequate for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger than I thought it would be. I make wooden fishing lures and this sander allows me to make the curved lines on a variety of lures. Changing spindles is esay, even for me with my arthritis. I even came up with a new lure using one of the spindles. There are enough different sizes for all my needs. Michael
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Halverson

customer_reviews.title: wood worker
customer_reviews.text: My husbsand likes it...just have to get him to take it out to his shop and out of the house...so far he hasn't tried using it in the house...he did that one time when I gave him another tool for Christmas...I came home and found the tool set up in the living room with saw dust all over...he has not used it yet but when he does I'm sure he will like it...he is currently recovering from surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Chick

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I received the sander. The packaging had been opened and the styrofoam broken. When I set it up I am missing 3 washers that are essential for its operation!!
customer_reviews.author: Booboo

customer_reviews.title: Powertec Spindle Sander
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a Christmas present to my son. I ordered the sander to be delivered to my son's home. It arrived in a timeley manner, but the spindle was bent. He packed it up and sent it back. The replacement sander arrived in a timely manner. He opened the box an the case was broken. He sent it back and went to a big box store to buy one that worked. It may be a good sander but we'll never know. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: highliner

product_meta.title: POWERTEC OS1000 2.6 Amp Benchtop Oscillating Spindle Sander
product_meta.description:
Introducing the 2. 6 Amp Oscillating Spindle Sander Kit by POWERTEC. This spindle sander was designed to equip you with the proper woodworking tools ideal for sanding arcs, contours, curves and other irregular shapes. The sander uses a 2/5 horsepower induction motor that operates smoothly at approximately 30 strokes per minute on 4 rubber feet for reduced vibration to improve operational stability and comfort. This sander comes with round table inserts for sanding 90 to the spindle and slotted table inserts for angled sanding. Oscillating action reduces friction heat to protect wood and prolong sleeve life. The sander table top is round, providing ample coverage for different sized and shaped projects. Its cast iron construction helps deliver long-term durability and sturdy top that you can depend on. The onboard storage features side rod and disc slots that provide plenty of storage for a wide assortment of sanding disc and drums. For the everyday woodworking enthusiast that juggles multiple projects at one time, it also comes equipped with a built-in dust collection exhaust port to connect your shop vac allowing you to work unencumbered and with a workspace clean and free of dust and debris. Spindle Sander Kit Features: (6) Sanding Sleeves (5) Rubber Drum Spindles (1) Dust Port Onboard Storage more! Specs Induction Motor: 2/5 HP, 2. 6 Amps @ 1725 RPM Power Cord: 110V Spindle Stroke: 1-Inch Spindle Speed: 30 SPM Cast Iron Table: 18-Inch diameter Table Height: 15-1/2-Inch Spindle diameter: 1/2-Inch Drum Length: 4-1/2-Inch Base Diameter: 22-1/2-Inch x 16-1/2-Inc
